languages.text: "И правда, дражайший Владайм. Честным жителям Футфола тоже любопытно узнать, отчего же их прелюбезнейший Наместник не справляется со своими обязанностями — без пушки уже из дома не выйдешь. Ну... Конечно, всегда так было, но в последнее время приходится брать с собой еще и парочку вышибал с дубинками. Такие затраты!"

traits.locale_text: "И правда, дражайший Владайм. Честным жителям Футфола тоже любопытно узнать, отчего же их прелюбезнейший Наместник не справляется со своими обязанностями — без пушки уже из дома не выйдешь. Ну... Конечно, всегда так было, но в последнее время приходится брать с собой еще и парочку вышибал с дубинками. Растраты, заешь ли, немаленькие".

languages.text: "Indeed, my dear Vladaym. The honest people of Footfall would love to know why their illustrious Liege is failing at his responsibilities — can't leave your house without a gun these days. Well... I suppose it's always been this way, but now, as well as a gun, you also need to bring a couple of goons with clubs. Oh, the expense!"
languages.original_text: "И правда, дражайший Владайм. Честным жителям Футфола тоже любопытно узнать, отчего же их прелюбезнейший Наместник не справляется со своими обязанностями — без пушки уже из дома не выйдешь. Ну... Конечно, всегда так было, но в последнее время приходится брать с собой еще и парочку вышибал с дубинками. Такие затраты!"

I suppose it's always been this way, but now, as well as a gun, you also need to bring a couple of goons with clubs. Oh, the expense!"

languages.text: 「確かに、ヴラダイム。フットフォールの誠実な民達は、我らが誇り高き領主が、その責務を果たさない理由を知りたがっているだろうさ。最近じゃ銃がなけりゃ家から出れない始末だ。まあ…今までだってそうだけど、今は銃だけじゃなくて棍棒を持ったチンピラも数人連れていないとだ。あぁ、金がかかるねぇ！」
languages.original_text: "Indeed, my dear Vladaym. The honest people of Footfall would love to know why their illustrious Liege is failing at his responsibilities — can't leave your house without a gun these days. Well... I suppose it's always been this way, but now, as well as a gun, you also need to bring a couple of goons with clubs. Oh, the expense!"

traits.locale_text: 「確かに、ヴラダイム。フットフォールの誠実な民達は、我らが誇り高き領主が、その責務を果たさない理由を知りたがっているだろうさ。最近じゃ銃がなけりゃ家から出れない始末だ。まあ…今までだってそうだけど、今は銃だけじゃなくて棍棒を持ったチンピラも数人連れていないとだ。あぁ、金がかかるねぇ！」

languages.text: “可不是嘛，我亲爱的弗拉迪姆。落脚港诚实的民众也想知道，为什么他们杰出的总督没能履行他的职责。这段日子，出门根本不能不带枪。好吧……这个地方其实一直都是这样。可现在，除了带枪之外，还得带上好几个拿着棍子的打手。唉哟，这笔开销可真是要命！”
languages.original_text: "Indeed, my dear Vladaym. The honest people of Footfall would love to know why their illustrious Liege is failing at his responsibilities — can't leave your house without a gun these days. Well... I suppose it's always been this way, but now, as well as a gun, you also need to bring a couple of goons with clubs. Oh, the expense!"

traits.locale_text: “可不是嘛，我亲爱的弗拉迪姆。落脚港诚实的民众也想知道，为什么他们杰出的总督没能履行他的职责。这段日子，出门根本不能不带枪。好吧……这个地方其实一直都是这样。可现在，除了带枪之外，还得带上好几个拿着棍子的打手。唉哟，这笔开销可真是要命！”

languages.text: «Así es, mi querido Vladaym. A la gente honrada de Paso le encantaría saber por qué su ilustre Señor no cumple con lo que debe. Últimamente no se puede salir de casa sin un arma. Bueno... supongo que así ha sido siempre, pero ahora, además de una pistola, hay que llevar un par de matones con porras. ¡Con lo que vale eso!».
languages.original_text: "Indeed, my dear Vladaym. The honest people of Footfall would love to know why their illustrious Liege is failing at his responsibilities — can't leave your house without a gun these days. Well... I suppose it's always been this way, but now, as well as a gun, you also need to bring a couple of goons with clubs. Oh, the expense!"

traits.locale_text: «Así es, mi querido Vladaym. A la gente honrada de Paso le encantaría saber por qué su ilustre Señor no cumple con lo que debe. Últimamente no se puede salir de casa sin un arma. Bueno... supongo que así ha sido siempre, pero ahora, además de una pistola, hay que llevar un par de matones con porras. ¡Con lo que vale eso!».

languages.text: « Voilà une excellente question, mon cher Vladaym. Les honnêtes gens de Castel aimeraient beaucoup savoir pourquoi leur illustre suzerain manque à ses devoirs... On ne peut plus sortir de chez soi sans prendre une arme, ces temps-ci. Enfin... ça a toujours été le cas, mais aujourd'hui, en plus d'une arme, il faut aussi se faire accompagner de deux gardes du corps armés de gourdins. Et ce n'est pas donné, je vous ferai dire ! »
languages.original_text: "Indeed, my dear Vladaym. The honest people of Footfall would love to know why their illustrious Liege is failing at his responsibilities — can't leave your house without a gun these days. Well... I suppose it's always been this way, but now, as well as a gun, you also need to bring a couple of goons with clubs. Oh, the expense!"

traits.locale_text: « Voilà une excellente question, mon cher Vladaym. Les honnêtes gens de Castel aimeraient beaucoup savoir pourquoi leur illustre suzerain manque à ses devoirs... On ne peut plus sortir de chez soi sans prendre une arme, ces temps-ci. Enfin... ça a toujours été le cas, mais aujourd'hui, en plus d'une arme, il faut aussi se faire accompagner de deux gardes du corps armés de gourdins. Et ce n'est pas donné, je vous ferai dire ! »

languages.text: "In der Tat, mein lieber Vladaym. Die ehrlichen Bürger von Footfall wüssten gerne, warum ihr erlauchter Lehnsherr seiner Verantwortung nicht nachkommt – ohne Schusswaffe kann man heutzutage nicht mehr das Haus verlassen. Nun ... vermutlich war das schon immer so, aber jetzt braucht man außer der Schusswaffe noch einen Schlägertrupp mit Keulen. Oh, was das kostet!"
languages.original_text: "Indeed, my dear Vladaym. The honest people of Footfall would love to know why their illustrious Liege is failing at his responsibilities — can't leave your house without a gun these days. Well... I suppose it's always been this way, but now, as well as a gun, you also need to bring a couple of goons with clubs. Oh, the expense!"

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat, mein lieber Vladaym. Die ehrlichen Bürger von Footfall wüssten gerne, warum ihr erlauchter Lehnsherr seiner Verantwortung nicht nachkommt – ohne Schusswaffe kann man heutzutage nicht mehr das Haus verlassen. Nun ... vermutlich war das schon immer so, aber jetzt braucht man außer der Schusswaffe noch einen Schlägertrupp mit Keulen. Oh, was das kostet!"

languages.text: "Evet, neden sevgili Vladaym? Binliman'ın dürüst insanları, ünlü Emîrlerinin neden sorumluluklarını yerine getiremediğini bilmek istiyor. Bugünlerde sokağa silahsız çıkılamıyor. Kabul, hep öyleydi tabii ama artık yanına sadece silah değil, birkaç da sopalı fedai alman gerekiyor. Çok masraf!"
languages.original_text: "Indeed, my dear Vladaym. The honest people of Footfall would love to know why their illustrious Liege is failing at his responsibilities — can't leave your house without a gun these days. Well... I suppose it's always been this way, but now, as well as a gun, you also need to bring a couple of goons with clubs. Oh, the expense!"

traits.locale_text: "Değil mi sevgili Vladaym. Binliman'ın dürüst insanları, ünlü Emîr'lerinin neden sorumluluklarını yerine getiremediğini bilmek ister. Bugünlerde sokağa silahsız çıkılmıyor. Şey... Hep öyleydi tabii ama artık silahın yanında sopalı birkaç haydut da bulman gerekiyor. Çok masraf!"
